name: Merchant

aspects.high_concept: Shrewd Trader with Goods for Every Need
aspects.trouble: Always Looking for the Better Deal
other_aspects: 'I Have What You Need... For a Price'

stunts: Merchant Network: +2 to Contacts when locating rare or specific items through trading connections
Haggling Expert: +2 to Rapport when negotiating prices (works both ways - getting better deals and defending prices)
Quality Assessment: +2 to Notice when evaluating item authenticity, quality, or value

trust_clock.description: Level of trust - affects prices and willingness to trade rare items

notes: Merchants are essential for acquiring equipment, selling loot, and accessing trade networks. Good relationships with merchants can provide better prices, access to rare items, and information about other traders. They're typically neutral but pragmatic, willing to deal with anyone who has coin.
